summary: This is an automatic out-of-office email reply from an individual, likely a prosecutor or legal professional, indicating they are unavailable and may be delayed in responding to emails regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. It suggests ongoing legal work or communication related to the case.

keyFacts: The document is an automatic out-of-office email reply dated July 29, 2021.
The email subject references both Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating ongoing legal or procedural matters related to their cases.
The sender suggests contacting an AUSA (Assistant United States Attorney) for time-sensitive matters, implying the sender is involved in the legal prosecution or investigation.
